participant_1.background:
I loved spending summers in the mountains, where the weather was always cool and refreshing.
i am fairly conservative in politics.
I exercise three times a week to maintain a healthy lifestyle.
i like watching action adventure movies and eating popcorn.
Baseball helps me to relax and temporarily forget about my anxiety.

content.text: I have a secret tattoo of Owen's name that I hide from my parents.
I like that. Robert De Niro is my favorite actor.
I love watching action adventure movies and eating popcorn.
I like to relax by singing karaoke every Thursday night.
I believe that I can achieve anything.
I am not allowed to have pets because I live with my parents and they are allergic.
I exercise three times a week to maintain a healthy lifestyle.
I love spending summers in the mountains, where the weather was always cool and refreshing.
Baseball helps me to relax and temporarily forget about my anxiety.
I am fairly conservative in politics.
I like that. How do you think I can achieve anything?
You have to believe in yourself and never give up.
